import React from "react"; import style from "../css/profilebottom.module.css"; import Chat from "./Chat"; const ProfileBottom = (props) => { const { name, profilepicture, username, email, phone, website, company, address, } = props; return (
{/* ---------- (left side)----------- */}
{/* ------------ (name) ----------- */}

{name}

Username :

e-mail :

Phone :

Website :

{username}

{email}

{phone}

{website}

{/* --------------- (company)--------- */}

Company

Name :

catchphrase :

Bs :

{company.name}

{company.catchPhrase}

{company.bs}

{/* -------- (vertical line) ------ */}

{/* -------- (right side)---------- */}
{/* -----------(address)------- */}

Address:

Street :

Suite :

City :

Zipcode :

{address.street}

{address.suite}

{address.city}

{address.zipcode}

{/* ---------- (map)---------- */} {/* ---------- (geo)--------- */}

Lat : {address.geo.lat}

Lng : {address.geo.lng}

{/* ------------- (chat) ---------- */}
); }; export default ProfileBottom;
